===============================================================================
| This directory contains files to framework's distribution
===============================================================================

===============================================================================
| In this directory are framework files licensing, distribution and
| scripts to facilitate run in Linux and generate Windows installer.
===============================================================================

===============================================================================
| IMPORTANT: Always keep updated the informations from these files, most of them
| will be helpful to the "user", so put yourself in the user's place and think
| what can help in the use of framework.
===============================================================================
